Effect: Advantageous Roots.name: Effect: Advantageous Roots
Effect: Advantageous Roots.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-summons-assistant.pf2e-summons-assistant-actors.Actor.y1WKpar1MIgAN45Y]{Elemental Herald (Wood)}

Each enemy that fails its save takes a â€“10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the herald departs.

Effect: Aura of Redemption.name: Effect: Aura of Redemption
Effect: Aura of Redemption.description: While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tuZnRWHixLArvaIf]{Glimpse of Redemption} reaction

Effect: Aura of Retribution.name: Effect: Aura of Retribution
Effect: Aura of Retribution.description: While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EAP98XaChJEbgKcK]{Retributive Strike} reaction

Effect: Defy Chaos.name: Effect: Defy Chaos
Effect: Defy Chaos.description: You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald gain resistance 20 against spirit damage while the herald is present.

Effect: Defy Law.name: Effect: Defy Law
Effect: Defy Law.description: You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald gain resistance 20 against spirit damage while the herald is present.

Effect: In Plant Banner Range.name: Effect: In Plant Banner Range
Effect: In Plant Banner Range.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-summons-assistant.pf2e-summons-assistant-actors.Actor.D8gtAM19NQKqbBfW.Item.vidOKIYqEJb5aXE5]

This item is used by PF2e Summons to mark creatures in the Plant Banner range in order to use module automation to apply effects to them. This effect does nothing on its own.

Effect: Plant Banner.name: Effect: Plant Banner
Effect: Plant Banner.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xEeCaJsQeDtRAVk1]{Plant Banner}

You gain 4 temporary Hit Points, plus an additional 4 temporary Hit Points if the origin is 4th level and every 4 levels thereafter.
